thread.title: Authorities say Ohio man on electronic monitor raped teen
thread.title_full: Authorities say Ohio man on electronic monitor raped teen - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Authorities say Ohio man on electronic monitor raped teen
text:
CINCINNATI (AP) - Authorities say an Ohio man on an electronic monitor in a pending criminal case had a 14-year-old girl dropped off at his home by taxi, held her captive for months and raped her.
Twenty-year-old Cody Lee Jackson, of Norwood, Ohio, was recently arrested in Utah where he fled after he was taken off electronic monitoring this summer.
Court records say that while Jackson was being monitored at his Ohio home, he contacted the girl and had a taxi deliver her.
He faces federal charges of coercion and enticement of a minor to engage in illegal sexual activity and production of child pornography. The charges were unsealed Thursday in federal court in Ohio. He also faces state charges, including rape.
Court records don't list an attorney for Jackson.
